channel.title: ggplot2 on STAT-5014 Fall 2019
channel.description: Recent content in ggplot2 on STAT-5014 Fall 2019

item.title: Projecting knowledge in plots
item.description: Today’s Agenda Review good programming practices Review functions and looping Introduce Data Exploration Introduce Base R plotting Introduce “Grammer of Graphics” Homework 8 Good Programming Practices We started the class with ideas around Reproducible Research. The main idea being that the output we create should be something that someone else can reproduce. Code is an intricate part of our life and falls in the same bucket.
